Misericors, mikrokosmos, or, Medeleys offices containing an iniunction to all duties of mercy belonging to the whole man. Medeley, Thomas.
[12], 236 p.
By I. B[eale], Printed at London : 1619.
Printer's name from STC. Second word of main title transliterated from the Greek. Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
